title: Equivalent circuit models for predicting electrical and gas output characteristics of CO2 electrolysis cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2649-2658
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01709E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuki Kudo, Akihiko Ono, Satoshi Mikoshiba, Ryota Kitagawa
An equivalent circuit model for a CO2 electrolysis cell producing CO and H2 is proposed, taking into account that the CO2 input and the transfer of both carbonate and hydrogen carbonate ions limit the CO partial current density.
